org.jenkinsci.plugins.github.pullrequest.title: 943: Cherrypick "8268893 jcmd to trim the glibc heap" (SapMachine 17)
org.jenkinsci.plugins.github.pullrequest.body:
This brings the "System.trim_native_heap" jcmd to SapMachine 17.
I will attempt to officially downport "8268893 jcmd to trim the glibc heap" to jdk17u/jdk11u, but that may take some time (especially since CSRs are involved) and I like to see this in our SapMachine sooner.
The patch is super trivial; note however that this is not a 1:1 patch. The function "query_process_memory_info()" in the original patch lives in os_linux.cpp/hpp and is interwoven with other functions; for this patch, I isolated it locally in the new, command-specific trimCHeapDCmd.cpp. I did this to reduce merging trouble if os_linux changes.
fixes #943

org.jenkinsci.plugins.github.pullrequest.title: #895: Vitals: In SapMachine, we never shutdown the Vitals on VM exit (17)
org.jenkinsci.plugins.github.pullrequest.body:
(cherry picked from commit e226ab1cab3f3b786d5bbcca7aa80a7b1397fc54)
Downported to 17
fixes #895

org.jenkinsci.plugins.github.pullrequest.title: #895: Vitals: In SapMachine, we never shutdown the Vitals on VM exit (11)
org.jenkinsci.plugins.github.pullrequest.body:
(cherry picked from commit e226ab1cab3f3b786d5bbcca7aa80a7b1397fc54)
Downported to 11
fixes #895

org.jenkinsci.plugins.github.pullrequest.title: 939: Add facility to trace uninstrumented malloc calls in VM and third party coding
org.jenkinsci.plugins.github.pullrequest.body:
This PR merges the new SapMachine malloc trace facility into the sap machine.
For details, please see src/hotspot/os/linux/malloctrace/malloc_trace.md (https://github.com/SAP/SapMachine/blob/6e7d33fd02f116df227da96f4700f180bf0ef80b/src/hotspot/os/linux/malloctrace/malloc_trace.md)
Testing:
- the new facility comes with a number of gtest- and jtreg tests, which I ran manually. - Nightly tests ran with this patch in our openjdk builds since several weeks. I even switched malloc trace on at VM startup (normally its off) to give the tracer a good workout.
Thank you.
fixes #939

org.jenkinsci.plugins.github.pullrequest.title: 894: Vitals: printing to err file misses "now" value
org.jenkinsci.plugins.github.pullrequest.body:
Trivial change. When crashing, we accidentally omitted the "now" values from the vitals, so we would miss a development (e.g. spikes) in the last seconds before the crash.
fixes #894
